text: St John's Senior High School is a boys' Roman Catholic second-cycle institution in Sekondi in the Western Region of Ghana. The school is popularly known for its academics achievements and sports performance. ==History== The school was founded in January 1952 by the then-archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Cape Coast, Most Rev. William Thomas Porter of the Society of African Missions (SMA). ==See also== * Education in Ghana * List of senior high schools in Ghana * Roman Catholicism in Ghana ==References== Category:1952 establishments in Gold Coast (British colony) Category:Boys' schools in Ghana Category:Educational institutions established in 1952 Category:High schools in Ghana Category:Catholic secondary schools in Ghana Category:Education in the Western Region (Ghana) Category:Sekondi-Takoradi
title: St Johns Senior High (Sekondi)
